title: Bug 14113 - Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113 - Currently, when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, which is incorrect. As a result, the UI closes the class file editors opened on this jar, which is expected behavior for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, when attempting to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI does not react.
OB: Build 20020416 - Currently, when changing the attached source of a jar, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired instead of a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
EB: In this case, the class file editor should be refreshed to display the new source. For now, I will fire a (FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH | FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta and remove the FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH when this bug is fixed.
SR: Ensure that the UI reacts appropriately to the (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta and refreshes the class file editor to show the new source. Additionally, fix the bug so that a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta is not fired when changing the attached source of a jar.
